DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theGamblignant:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theGamblignant:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theGamblignant:TetradactylyRelic.NAME: Tetradactyly
theGamblignant:TetradactylyRelic.FLAVOR: You take great delight in the fact that you have 8 fingers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play 8 cards, add 4 to your next dice roll.

theGamblignant:BrightPowderRelic.NAME: Bright Powder
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Skill, gain 1 temporary Luck.

theGamblignant:BatteredPendulumRelic.NAME: Battered Pendulum
theGamblignant:BatteredPendulumRelic.FLAVOR: Supposedly, this is a part of a machine that grants conditional immortality. What can it do on its own?
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, roll 1d8. If you roll an 8, revive with 30% of your max HP.

theGamblignant:DreamBubbleRelic.NAME: Dream Bubble
theGamblignant:DreamBubbleRelic.FLAVOR: When you sleep, your dream self awakes.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you Rest, visit a random ? room.

theGamblignant:ZillywairRelic.NAME: Cutlass of Zillywair
theGamblignant:ZillywairRelic.FLAVOR: Flippety dippety doo bup bup shrubber double floppy mumblescurry noodlescoop pizzabubble pizzabubble mip mip mip mip mip mip
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play 3 Attacks in 1 turn, gain 1 Luck.

theGamblignant:CloversHatRelic.NAME: Clover's Hat
theGamblignant:CloversHatRelic.FLAVOR: Just looking at this thing kinda pisses you off. It doesnâ€™t even have horn holes.
DESCRIPTIONS: On pickup, lose 75% of your max HP. Start each combat with 4 Luck.

theGamblignant:BloodSpadeRelic.NAME: Blood Spade
theGamblignant:BloodSpadeRelic.FLAVOR: What kind of blood even is this?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Energy. If your dice rolls between playing two cards add up to 21, take 13 damage.

theGamblignant:ScratchedCoinRelic.NAME: Scratched Coin
theGamblignant:ScratchedCoinRelic.FLAVOR: 1 double-headed Troll Caegar. His image has been defaced, presumably by some lunatic.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each combat, gain 1d20 Gold.

theGamblignant:BionicBoundbeastRelic.NAME: Bionic Boundbeast
theGamblignant:BionicBoundbeastRelic.FLAVOR: You've heard that these creatures can bring luck. You haven't heard of any that look quite like this, though.

theGamblignant:SpindownDiceRelic.NAME: Spindown Dice
theGamblignant:SpindownDiceRelic.FLAVOR: When you roll this dice, it always lands on
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HPm add the amount of HP lost to your next roll.

theGamblignant:DarkMapRelic.NAME: Dark Map
theGamblignant:DarkMapRelic.FLAVOR: The once blank parchment is now glowing with patterns of broken glass.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, instead of drawing 5 cards, draw 1d7+3 cards.
